segments.text: The kitchen looks bright with daylight from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is polishing a plate at the sink, completely zoned in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the faucet blasting water, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cascading down the front, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe's in the puddle—how has she not felt that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze, there's a boy on a stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back—wow, that's precarious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate too, like some circus act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below reaches up, eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is unexpectedly risky for cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is calm, contrasting the indoor surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make it look even more adventurous.
segments.speaker: PAR
